circumstances: Ian Hewitt vanished after leaving his home on Arthurstone Terrace. His colleague last reported seeing him around Discovery Quay, Dundee. Known to struggle with suicidal ideation, Ian had reportedly mentioned feeling overwhelmed by his health condition. Familial concern heightened following his disappearance, especially given his belief to seek refuge in a forested area. Investigations led to the desert-like and remote outskirts connected to a domestic violence-related cult location. Ian was eventually found by family members at Dock Street, appearing disoriented but physically unharmed, ending a distressing multi-day search.
